original_text: The fish in the river died. The river had such a bad smell that the Egyptians could not drink its water. There was blood in every part of Egypt.
korean_text: 나일 강의 고기가 죽고 그 물에서는 악취가 나니 애굽 사람들이 나일 강 물을 마시지 못하며 애굽 온 땅에는 피가 있으나

sentences.original_text: The fish in the river died.
The river had such a bad smell
that the Egyptians could not drink its water.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이집트 사람들은 그 물을 마실 수 없었다.
